ComicInfo.Summary:
Welcome to the United States of Ruin. A player has leveled up and taken a king. Can Morn and Rayne's combined forces be enough to over come Ruin's grasp on the USA, as the R.U.N. Program inches closer to nuclear devastation?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Shane Davis, Michelle Delecki & Morry Hollowell | 1 | B | Cover B | Shane Davis, Michelle Delecki & Morry Hollowell | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-02 18:11:41. [CVDB513682]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Michelle Delecki, Morry Hollowell, Shane Davis
ComicInfo.Inker: Michelle Delecki, Morry Hollowell, Shane Davis
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Michelle Delecki, Morry Hollowell, Shane Davis
